name: Kineticar sim chrono racing
description:
A car simulation chronometred game with real car physics. This is an Alpha version and for the example, we have an old pick up with a high gravity center and 600 hp motor. Enjoy the ride.

CONTROLS

A,W,S,D

RESTART

B

* Please have in consideration that the game is in a very early phase of the developments, so dont take into account the deffects that you might find in the game as the sound etc, just focus in the physics of the car and if you can do the track in less than 2 minutes Lol
